sense.def:
A bearer
je oseba, ki prenaša nosila ali krsto.

seg.quote: The four bearers lifted the coffin slowly.

sense.def:
The bearer of something
, na primer pisma, listine ali vesti, je oseba, ki tisto ima in nam prinese.

seg.quote: The document contains the bearer's fingerprints.

sense.def:
The bearer of a name or title
je oseba, ki ima tako ime ali naziv.
